data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Val-d‘Oise, Île-de-France, France.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Val-d‘Oise, Île-de-France, France
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, help the 14,565 believers in Val-d'Oise to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.section_summary: On average, 124 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Val-d‘Oise, Île-de-France, France.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Val-d‘Oise, Île-de-France, France.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Val-d‘Oise, Île-de-France, France that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Arab, Palestinian people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Arab, Palestinian people.
Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Val-d‘Oise, Île-de-France, France will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the county of Val-d'Oise to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.section_summary:
the county of Val-d‘Oise, Île-de-France, France has a population of 1,185,400.

We estimate Val-d'Oise has 14,565 people who might know Jesus, 724,896 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 445,939 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Val-d'Oise access to a Bible in their own language.
